text:
@BorisJohnson There is only one way to stop #coronavirus 

Everyone stay at home simultaneously for  3 weeks, (whatever the full-scale period is)

Then the virus will go extinct, provided it  has no viable animal hosts.

Short of this, almost everyone will get it, no matter what
